definitions.explanation_en: A surname of English origin, commonly associated with notable individuals such as the American composer Charles Ives or the British actor Hugh Ives. It is used to identify persons bearing this family name.
definitions.explanation_cn: 一个源自英语的姓氏，常与著名人物相关，如美国作曲家查尔斯·艾夫斯（Charles Ives）或英国演员休·艾夫斯（Hugh Ives）。用于指代拥有此姓氏的人。
definitions.example_en: Charles Ives was a pioneering American composer known for his experimental harmonies.
definitions.example_cn: 查尔斯·艾夫斯是一位以实验性和声著称的开创性美国作曲家。
